titleStmt.title: The golden fleece VVhereto bee annexed two elegies, entitled Narcissus change. And Æsons dotage. By Richard Brathvvayte Gentleman.
titleStmt.author: Brathwaite, Richard, 1588?-1673.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by W[illiam] S[tansby] for Christopher Pursett dwelling in Holborne, neere Staple Inn,

notesStmt.note: "Sonnets or madrigals" has separate dated title page; register is continuous.
The verso of the final leaf has catchword: THE.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
